dct_title_s: Χάρτης Θερμομεταλλικών Πηγών της Ελλάδας / Ινστιτούτο Γεωλογικών και Mεταλλευτικών Eρευνών ; Γ. Ορφανος ; Α. Γκατζογιαννης ; Χρ. Φουντου-Ροβη. (Sheet 1)
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by spot heights. Map shows geological formations, tectonic data, water qualification, spring temperature, type of spring occurrence, and three categories of springs. Includes index of spring names. Ancillary maps on sheet 2 show the Phthiotis region including the Smokovou and Kaitsas thermal baths and the Malian Gulf shoreline (35 x 35 cm and 6 x 34 cm). Ancillary map on sheet 3 shows international boundary between Greece (Rhodes and surrounding Dodecanese islands) and Southwestern coast of Turkey (5 x 7 cm). "P.G.D.M. (Prosōpinē onomasia, OĒE) = F.Y.R.O.M. (Provisional name, U.N.)." Π.Γ.Δ.Μ. (Προσωπινη ονομασια, ΟΗΕ).
dct_publisher_sm: Athēnai : Institouton Geōlogikōn kai Metalleutikōn Ereunōn, 1995.
